review: This is a cool little piece of hardware. It will be better yet when more applications and video sources are supported. But it is very cool to select a movie or show from Netflix on my phone, then use the phone to tell Netflix to send the stream directly to the TV without and further use of phone resources.
author: jmax

review: The Google Chromecast does what it is suppose to do.  I am able to view Netflix on my non-Wifi TV along with a few other Google apps and Chrome.  Chrome can be used via a desktop or laptop.  It is great.  I can not compare it to a streaming device because it does not have as many apps but it will do for now.  Hulu Plus has currently been added so this is a plus!!I highly recommend this item. I really love the fact that I have received 3 months free of Netflix service.I am very pleased with my purchase.  Make sure you update your Chromecast when it is available to keep the app running smoothly.
